about.title: About Our Initiative
about.subtitle: Learn more about our student organization
about.history.title: Our History
about.history.content: Founded in 2010, GAF has grown from a small study group to a university-wide initiative supporting thousands of students each year through tutoring, mentoring, and community events.
about.values.title: Our Values
about.values.academic_text: We promote high-quality education and research through peer-led learning initiatives.
about.values.community_text: Building strong connections between students across all faculties and study levels.
about.team.title: Meet the Team
